controllers

Class DestinationController

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • controllers.Controller
        • controllers.DestinationController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, SensorListener

    public class DestinationController
extends Controller
    The controller that tries to follow the line to the destination.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Noah Steijlen, Scott Mackay, Bouke Stam, Timon van den Brink

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Thread

      • control

        public void control()

        Specified by:

      • valueChanged

        public void valueChanged(Sensor source,
                         int value)
        When the value of one of the sensors that this object is listening for has changed, this method gets called with the new value and the sensor. In this method all logic of keep following the line and finding back the line is here controlled.
        Specified by:
        valueChanged in interface SensorListener
        Specified by:
        valueChanged in class Controller
        Parameters:
        source - the sensor who's value has changed.
        value - the new value of the sensor.
